```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(terra)
library(here)
```

## Plot corridors

```{r}
corridor_rast <- rast(here('lawler_data/corridors/Corridor_raster.tif'))

plot(corridor_rast)

thresh <- 10
corr_thresh_rast <- corridor_rast
corr_thresh_rast[corr_thresh_rast < thresh] <- NA
plot(corr_thresh_rast)
```
